description: Irish Coffee's tasty combination of sugar, whiskey, whipped cream, and coffee made it as a household name in the cocktail world. If you can't get enough of it, why not make it at home? It's easy to do. Plus, its ingredients are readily available in local grocery stores.
keywords: how to make jameson irish whiskey cocktail
name: Jameson Whiskey Irish Coffee
recipeIngredient: .5 cup heavy cream (whip in shaker tin with spring from hawthorne style strainer and pour over spoon into mug) *You can make your own fresh whipped cream in less than 30 seconds

recipeInstructions.name: Add 1 tsp white sugar and 1 tsp brown sugar.
recipeInstructions.text: Add 1 tsp white sugar and 1 tsp brown sugar.

recipeInstructions.name: Add 2 oz. of Jameson to a cup.
recipeInstructions.text: Add 2 oz. of Jameson to a cup.

recipeInstructions.name: Shake heavy cream in a chilled shaker tin w/ spring.
recipeInstructions.text: Shake heavy cream in a chilled shaker tin w/ spring.

recipeInstructions.name: Add whipped cream over spoon to top of glass
recipeInstructions.text: Add whipped cream over spoon to top of glass
